|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Nanya;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 54:A0:50 |oui = 54:A0:50

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N:141701520006J R01" is silkscreened on the board. :OEM: [[Arcadyan]] [http://www.arcadyan.com/contentPage.aspx?type=product-detail&L2id=7&prod2id=22 MR7015AL] Model Part Num: 90IG01I0-BM3G00
*4G LTE mobile broadband for fast internet speeds up to 100Mbps *Wireless-N speeds up to 300Mbps for reliable Wi-Fi connections *Built-in Dual-WAN connection for home and office connectivity *Dual-purpose wired LAN/WAN Ethernet port
===Specifications=== *LTE: Downlink 100Mbps / Uplink 50Mbps *HSPA+: Downlink 28Mbps / Uplink 11Mbps *4G FDD-LTE: 800 /1800 /2600 *3G UMTS: 900 /2100 *Antenna: :Internal 3x 2dBi antenna for Wi-Fi :Fixed 2x 2dBi antenna for Mobile
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/en/component/content/article/197-asus-4g-n12.html ''ASUS 4G-N12'' on '''FoxNetwork'''] :OUI: [http://hwaddress.com/?q=54:A0:50 54:A0:50]
==See also== ;[https://www.asus.com/Networking/4G-LTE-3G-Routers-Products/ '''ASUS 3G/4G LTE Routers'''] *ASUS 4G-N12 (A1) - ''Wireless-N300 LTE Modem Router'' *[[ASUS 4G-N12 B1]] - ''Wireless-N300 LTE Modem Router'' *[[ASUS 4G-AC53U]] - ''AC750 Dual-Band LTE Wi-Fi Modem Router'' *[[ASUS 4G-AC55U]] - ''Wireless-AC1200 LTE Modem Gigabit Router'' :OUI: [http://hwaddress.com/?q=AC:9E:17 AC:9E:17] • [https://klseet.com/index.php/198-tm-unifi/unifi-asus/asus-news-update/308-asus-new-product-update-2015-q1 klseet] • [http://us.hardware.info/productinfo/276404/asus-$g-ac55u-dual-band-wireless-ac1200-lte-modem-router/photos HW] • [http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/en/component/content/article/209-asus-4g-ac55u.html FoxNetwork Review] *[[ASUS 4G-AC68U]] - ''AC1900 Dual-Band LTE Wi-Fi Modem Router''
